exportDescription: Export all your data including images and audio to a selected folder.
importDescription: Import data from a selected folder. You can choose to overwrite everything (Restore) or merge with existing data.
restoreDescription: Wipes all existing data and replaces it with the backup.
mergeDescription: Adds new data. Conflicts are skipped and reported.
conflictsDescription: The following records already exist and were NOT imported. You can download this list as JSON.
